name: Eat Me Alive
description:
You are the bug!


You decide the best body part to settle into. Create offspring and keep evolving into a better self.
But be aware of your human host, you don not want to upset or even kill it.

▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬●▬

The goal of the game is to find a good balance between getting your ressources without
upsetting the host. You can place yourself at any body part to get different ressources.
Also by researching different genetic eveolutions you can place bugs with distinct
properties.
